projects.title: Tokyo
projects.description: Tokyo is my first web development project. Project Tokyo is a city guide, but also contains the most popular Information Technology Companies In Tokyo. Created for Road To Hire Gateway.

projects.title: Magic Mirror
projects.description: Magic Mirror is an application created to help you know the current weather and time without having to switch to different websites. It's a convenient dashboard that is multi-purpose functionality. Magic Mirror was created with the help of different API, which offers a detailed weather forecast.

projects.title: Crash Of Cards
projects.description: Crash Of Cards is a game created with the help of ReactJs and https://deckofcardsapi.com/. This application was created with the sole purpose of understanding the ReactJs library.

projects.title: Instagram Redesign
projects.description: Instagram Redesign is a full stack application utilizing the MongoDB, ReactJs, Express, and NodeJs. This application was created with the sole purpose of redesign and restore a fresh new design to Instagram.
